name: AcrylicJS
short_description: AcrylicJS is a Javascript framework specially designed for high-quality web app development. Provides, among another features, UI, Message Bus (with server push). Formerly known as 'TUIC', AcrylicJS now has gone LGPL. We're accepting collaboration!
